tool_description: Analyzes completed background check results to identify potential red flags, policy violations, and risk factors for volunteer placement decisions.

role_type.description: Volunteer role type for risk assessment

error_messages: Invalid request ID: Provide a valid background check request identifier
Missing role type: Specify the volunteer position for proper risk assessment
Empty policies list: Provide organizational screening policies for evaluation
Malformed results data: Background check results must be in proper format
usage: Input completed background check results along with role type and organizational policies to receive risk assessment and compliance evaluation.

overall_status.description: Overall background check result (clear, conditional, failed)

recommendation.description: Recommended action based on background check results
